question: Which author has been selected for the Booker Prize 2020 for his work ‘Shuggie Bain’?
explanation:
The Booker Prize 2020 has been awarded to Scottish-American writer Douglas Stuart for his debut novel ‘Shuggie Bain’.
The shortlist for the coveted award consisted of five more titles which also included Avni Doshi’s book ‘Burnt Sugar’, which was published in India as ‘Girl in White Cotton’. Last year the Prize was won jointly to Atwood for ‘The Testaments’ and Evaristo for ‘Girl, Woman, Other’.
